        "cat > component0-RequiredPackages.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
apt-get update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get upgrade -y
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y curl sudo jq bash zip unzip iptables software-properties-common ca-certificates
curl -sfLo /tmp/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.deb https://s3.amazonaws.com/amazoncloudwatch-agent/ubuntu/amd64/latest/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.deb
dpkg -i -E /tmp/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.deb
rm /tmp/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.deb
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component0-RequiredPackages.sh",
        "cat > component1-RunnerUser.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
addgroup runner
adduser --system --disabled-password --home /home/runner --ingroup runner runner
echo "%runner   ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" > /etc/sudoers.d/runner
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component1-RunnerUser.sh",
        "cat > component2-Git.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
add-apt-repository ppa:git-core/ppa
apt-get update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y git
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component2-Git.sh",
        "cat > component3-GithubCli.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | sudo dd of=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg
echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg]   https://cli.github.com/packages stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null
apt-get update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y gh
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component3-GithubCli.sh",
        "cat > component4-AwsCli.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSL "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -o awscliv2.zip
unzip -q awscliv2.zip
./aws/install
rm -rf awscliv2.zip aws
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component4-AwsCli.sh",
        "cat > component5-GithubRunner.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
RUNNER_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/v]+$"`
curl -fsSLO "https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v${RUNNER_VERSION}/actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
tar -C /home/runner -xzf "actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
rm actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz
echo -n latest > /home/runner/RUNNER_VERSION
/home/runner/bin/installdependencies.sh
mkdir -p /opt/hostedtoolcache
chown runner /opt/hostedtoolcache
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component5-GithubRunner.sh",
        "aws s3 cp

asset6-Custom-Undefined-0",
        "cat > component6-Custom-Undefined.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
touch /custom-file
mkdir /custom-dir
mv FUNDING.yml /custom-dir
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component6-Custom-Undefined.sh",
        "cat > component7-EnvironmentVariables.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
echo 'HELLO=world' >> /home/runner/.env
echo 'FOO=bar' >> /home/runner/.env
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component7-EnvironmentVariables.sh",
        "cat > Dockerfile <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
FROM public.ecr.aws/lts/ubuntu:22.04
VOLUME /var/lib/docker
COPY component0-RequiredPackages.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component0-RequiredPackages.sh

COPY component1-RunnerUser.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component1-RunnerUser.sh

COPY component2-Git.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component2-Git.sh

COPY component3-GithubCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component3-GithubCli.sh

COPY component4-AwsCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component4-AwsCli.sh

COPY component5-GithubRunner.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component5-GithubRunner.sh
ENV RUNNER_VERSION=latest
COPY asset6-Custom-Undefined-0 FUNDING.yml
COPY component6-Custom-Undefined.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component6-Custom-Undefined.sh

COPY component7-EnvironmentVariables.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component7-EnvironmentVariables.sh


EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "docker build --progress plain . -t "$REPO_URI"",
        "docker push "$REPO_URI""
      ]
    },
    "post_build": {
      "commands": [
        "rm -f codebuild-log.sh && STATUS="SUCCESS"",
        "if [ $CODEBUILD_BUILD_SUCCEEDING -ne 1 ]; then STATUS="FAILURE"; fi",
        "cat <<EOF > /tmp/payload.json
{
  "Status": "$STATUS",
  "UniqueId": "build",
  "Reason": `sed 's/[^[:print:]]//g' /tmp/codebuild.log | tail -c 400 | jq -Rsa .`,
  "Data": "$RANDOM"
}
EOF",
        "if [ "$WAIT_HANDLE" != "unspecified" ]; then jq . /tmp/payload.json; curl -fsSL -X PUT -H "Content-Type:" -d "@/tmp/payload.json" "$WAIT_HANDLE"; fi",
        "docker rmi "$REPO_URI"",
        "LATEST_SOCI_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/]+$"`",
        "curl -fsSL https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/download/${LATEST_SOCI_VERSION}/standalone-soci-indexer_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz | tar xz",
        "./standalone-soci-indexer "$REPO_URI""
      ]
    }
  }
}

#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail

EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",

EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component1-RunnerUser.sh",

#!/bin/bash

apt-get update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y gh
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component3-GithubCli.sh",

#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSL "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -o awscliv2.zip
unzip -q awscliv2.zip
./aws/install
rm -rf awscliv2.zip aws
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component4-AwsCli.sh",
        "cat > component5-Docker.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker.gpg
echo   "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu   $(lsb_release -cs) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
apt-get update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-compose-plugin
usermod -aG docker runner
ln -s /usr/libexec/docker/cli-plugins/docker-compose /usr/bin/docker-compose
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component5-Docker.sh",
        "cat > component6-GithubRunner.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
RUNNER_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/v]+$"`
curl -fsSLO "https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v${RUNNER_VERSION}/actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
tar -C /home/runner -xzf "actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
rm actions-runner-linux-x64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz
echo -n latest > /home/runner/RUNNER_VERSION
/home/runner/bin/installdependencies.sh
mkdir -p /opt/hostedtoolcache
chown runner /opt/hostedtoolcache
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",

        "aws s3 cp

FROM public.ecr.aws/lts/ubuntu:22.04
VOLUME /var/lib/docker
COPY component0-RequiredPackages.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component0-RequiredPackages.sh

COPY component1-RunnerUser.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component1-RunnerUser.sh

COPY component2-Git.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component2-Git.sh

COPY component3-GithubCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component3-GithubCli.sh

COPY component4-AwsCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component4-AwsCli.sh

COPY component5-Docker.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component5-Docker.sh

COPY component6-GithubRunner.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component6-GithubRunner.sh
ENV RUNNER_VERSION=latest
COPY asset7-Custom-Undefined-0 FUNDING.yml
COPY component7-Custom-Undefined.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component7-Custom-Undefined.sh

COPY component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh


EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "docker build --progress plain . -t "$REPO_URI"",
        "docker push "$REPO_URI""
      ]

    "post_build": {
      "commands": [
        "rm -f codebuild-log.sh && STATUS="SUCCESS"",
        "if [ $CODEBUILD_BUILD_SUCCEEDING -ne 1 ]; then STATUS="FAILURE"; fi",
        "cat <<EOF > /tmp/payload.json
{
  "Status": "$STATUS",
  "UniqueId": "build",
  "Reason": `sed 's/[^[:print:]]//g' /tmp/codebuild.log | tail -c 400 | jq -Rsa .`,
  "Data": "$RANDOM"
}
EOF",
        "if [ "$WAIT_HANDLE" != "unspecified" ]; then jq . /tmp/payload.json; curl -fsSL -X PUT -H "Content-Type:" -d "@/tmp/payload.json" "$WAIT_HANDLE"; fi",
        "docker rmi "$REPO_URI"",
        "LATEST_SOCI_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/]+$"`",
        "curl -fsSL https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/download/${LATEST_SOCI_VERSION}/standalone-soci-indexer_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz | tar xz",
        "./standalone-soci-indexer "$REPO_URI""
      ]
    }
  }
}

      "commands": [
        "cat > component0-RequiredPackages.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
dnf upgrade -y
dnf install -y jq tar gzip bzip2 which binutils zip unzip sudo shadow-utils findutils amazon-cloudwatch-agent
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component0-RequiredPackages.sh",
        "cat > component1-RunnerUser.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
/usr/sbin/groupadd runner
/usr/sbin/useradd --system --shell /usr/sbin/nologin --home-dir /home/runner --gid runner runner
mkdir -p /home/runner
chown runner /home/runner
echo "%runner   ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" > /etc/sudoers.d/runner
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component1-RunnerUser.sh",
        "cat > component2-Git.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
dnf install -y git
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component2-Git.sh",
        "cat > component3-GithubCli.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSSL https://cli.github.com/packages/rpm/gh-cli.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/gh-cli.repo
dnf install -y gh
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component3-GithubCli.sh",
        "cat > component4-AwsCli.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
curl -fsSL "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-aarch64.zip" -o awscliv2.zip
unzip -q awscliv2.zip
./aws/install
rm -rf awscliv2.zip aws
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component4-AwsCli.sh",
        "cat > component5-GithubRunner.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
RUNNER_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/v]+$"`
curl -fsSLO "https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v${RUNNER_VERSION}/actions-runner-linux-arm64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
tar -C /home/runner -xzf "actions-runner-linux-arm64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz"
rm actions-runner-linux-arm64-${RUNNER_VERSION}.tar.gz
echo -n latest > /home/runner/RUNNER_VERSION
dnf install -y openssl-libs krb5-libs zlib libicu-67.1
mkdir -p /opt/hostedtoolcache
chown runner /opt/hostedtoolcache
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component5-GithubRunner.sh",
        "aws s3 cp

asset6-Lambda-Entrypoint-1",
        "cat > component6-Lambda-Entrypoint.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail

EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component6-Lambda-Entrypoint.sh",
        "aws s3 cp

asset7-Custom-Undefined-0",
        "cat > component7-Custom-Undefined.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
touch /custom-file
mkdir /custom-dir
mv FUNDING.yml /custom-dir
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component7-Custom-Undefined.sh",
        "cat > component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
#!/bin/bash
set -exuo pipefail
echo 'HELLO=world' >> /home/runner/.env
echo 'FOO=bar' >> /home/runner/.env
EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "chmod +x component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh",
        "cat > Dockerfile <<'EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE'
FROM public.ecr.aws/amazonlinux/amazonlinux:2023
VOLUME /var/lib/docker
COPY component0-RequiredPackages.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component0-RequiredPackages.sh

COPY component1-RunnerUser.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component1-RunnerUser.sh

COPY component2-Git.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component2-Git.sh

COPY component3-GithubCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component3-GithubCli.sh

COPY component4-AwsCli.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component4-AwsCli.sh

COPY component5-GithubRunner.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component5-GithubRunner.sh
ENV RUNNER_VERSION=latest
COPY asset6-Lambda-Entrypoint-0 /bootstrap.sh
COPY asset6-Lambda-Entrypoint-1 /runner.sh
COPY component6-Lambda-Entrypoint.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component6-Lambda-Entrypoint.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["bash", "/bootstrap.sh"]
COPY asset7-Custom-Undefined-0 FUNDING.yml
COPY component7-Custom-Undefined.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component7-Custom-Undefined.sh

COPY component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh /tmp
RUN /tmp/component8-EnvironmentVariables.sh


EOFGITHUBRUNNERSDOCKERFILE",
        "docker build --progress plain . -t "$REPO_URI"",
        "docker push "$REPO_URI""
      ]
    },
    "post_build": {
      "commands": [
        "rm -f codebuild-log.sh && STATUS="SUCCESS"",
        "if [ $CODEBUILD_BUILD_SUCCEEDING -ne 1 ]; then STATUS="FAILURE"; fi",
        "cat <<EOF > /tmp/payload.json
{
  "Status": "$STATUS",
  "UniqueId": "build",
  "Reason": `sed 's/[^[:print:]]//g' /tmp/codebuild.log | tail -c 400 | jq -Rsa .`,
  "Data": "$RANDOM"
}
EOF",
        "if [ "$WAIT_HANDLE" != "unspecified" ]; then jq . /tmp/payload.json; curl -fsSL -X PUT -H "Content-Type:" -d "@/tmp/payload.json" "$WAIT_HANDLE"; fi",
        "docker rmi "$REPO_URI"",
        "LATEST_SOCI_VERSION=`curl -w "%{redirect_url}" -fsS https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/latest | grep -oE "[^/]+$"`",
        "curl -fsSL https://github.com/CloudSnorkel/standalone-soci-indexer/releases/download/${LATEST_SOCI_VERSION}/standalone-soci-indexer_Linux_arm64.tar.gz | tar xz",
        "./standalone-soci-indexer "$REPO_URI""
      ]
    }
  }
}

TASK_TOKEN="{}"
logGroupName="{}"
runnerNamePath="{}"
githubDomainPath="{}"
ownerPath="{}"
repoPath="{}"
runnerTokenPath="{}"
labels="{}"
registrationURL="{}"

heartbeat () \{
  while true; do
    aws stepfunctions send-task-heartbeat --task-token "$TASK_TOKEN"
    sleep 60
  done
\}
setup_logs () \{
  cat <<EOF > /tmp/log.conf || exit 1
  \{
    "logs": \{
      "log_stream_name": "unknown",
      "logs_collected": \{
        "files": \{
          "collect_list": [
            \{
              "file_path": "/var/log/runner.log",
              "log_group_name": "$logGroupName",
              "log_stream_name": "$runnerNamePath",
              "timezone": "UTC"
            \}
          ]
        \}
      \}
    \}
  \}
EOF
  /opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/bin/amazon-cloudwatch-agent-ctl -a fetch-config -m ec2 -s -c file:/tmp/log.conf || exit 2
\}
action () \{
  # Determine the value of RUNNER_FLAGS
  if [ "$(< RUNNER_VERSION)" = "latest" ]; then
    RUNNER_FLAGS=""
  else
    RUNNER_FLAGS="--disableupdate"
  fi

  labelsTemplate="$labels,cdkghr:started:$(date +%s)"

  # Execute the configuration command for runner registration
  sudo -Hu runner /home/runner/config.sh --unattended --url "$registrationURL" --token "$runnerTokenPath" --ephemeral --work _work --labels "$labelsTemplate" $RUNNER_FLAGS --name "$runnerNamePath" || exit 1

  # Execute the run command
  sudo --preserve-env=AWS_REGION -Hu runner /home/runner/run.sh || exit 2

  # Retrieve the status
  STATUS=$(grep -Phors "finish job request for job [0-9a-f\-]+ with result: K.*" /home/runner/_diag/ | tail -n1)

  # Check and print the job status
  [ -n "$STATUS" ] && echo CDKGHA JOB DONE "$labels" "$STATUS"
\}
heartbeat &
if setup_logs && action | tee /var/log/runner.log 2>&1; then
  aws stepfunctions send-task-success --task-token "$TASK_TOKEN" --task-output '\{"ok": true\}'
else
  aws stepfunctions send-task-failure --task-token "$TASK_TOKEN"
fi
sleep 10  # give cloudwatch agent its default 5 seconds buffer duration to upload logs
poweroff
